address-of-entrypoint.description: The address of the entry point relative to the image base when the executable file is loaded into memory

base-of-code.description: Address relative to the imagebase where the binary's code starts

base-of-data.description: Address relative to the imagebase where the binary's data starts

dll-characteristics.description: Some characteristics of the underlying binary

dll-characteristics-hex.description: The DLL characteristics in a single hex value

file-alignment.description: The alignment factor (in bytes) that is used to align the raw data of sections in the image file

image-base.description: The preferred base address when mapping the binary in memory

loader-flags.description: According to the PE specifications, this value is reserved and should be 0

magic.description: Magic value (PE_TYPE) that identifies a PE32 from a PE64

magic-hex.description: The magic value in a simple hex value

major-image-version.description: The major version number of the image

major-os-version.description: The major version number of the required operating system

major-subsystem-version.description: The major version number of the subsystem

minor-image-version.description: The minor version number of the image

minor-os-version.description: The minor version number of the required operating system

minor-subsystem-version.description: The minor version number of the subsystem

number-of-rva-and-size.description: The number of DataDirectory that follow this header

section-alignment.description: The alignment (in bytes) of sections when they are loaded into memory. It must be greater than or equal to file_alignment and the default is the page size for the architecture

size-of-code.description: The size of the code .text section or the sum of all the sections that contain code

size-of-headers.description: The combined size of an MS-DOS stub, PE header, and section headers rounded up to a multiple of file_alignment

size-of-heap-commit.description: The size of the local heap space to commit

size-of-heap-reserve.description: The size of the local heap space to reserve

size-of-image.description: The size (in bytes) of the image, including all headers, as the image is loaded in memory

size-of-initialised-data.description: The size of the initialized data which are usually located in the .data section. If the initialized data are split across multiple sections, it is the sum of the sections

size-of-stack-commit.description: The size of the stack to commit

size-of-stack-reserve.description: The size of the stack to reserve

size-of-uninitialised-data.description: The size of the uninitialized data which are usually located in the .bss section. If the uninitialized data are split across multiple sections, it is the sum of the sections

subsystem-hex.description: The subsystem in a simple hex value

win32-version-value.description: Specifies the reserved win32 version value (must be zero)

description: Object describing a Portable Executable Optional Header
name: pe-optional-header
